description:
He is a Third Progenitor just like http://anidb.net/ch73466 [Krul], who he is currently in a power struggle with. He has destroyed the human organizations in Europe that was researching on the Seraph of the End. He has through extraordinary ability subdued vampire nobles and has his own faction.
translated from http://owarino-seraph.com by Iggdrassil
name: Lest Ka
